summary: THIS IS MY FIRST MOD!!!! I AM STILL LEARNING!!! Ionex (say i-on-icks) is a cool Argonian follower found in Four Shields Tavern in Dragon Bridge. He comes in full Daedric and has a Daedric sword as well. I know its not the best, but I just thought there's only one Argonian follower in the game and that's Derkeethu
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]THIS IS MY FIRST MOD!!!! I AM STILL LEARNING!!! Ionex (say i-on-icks) is a cool Argonian follower found in Four Shields Tavern in Dragon Bridge. He comes in full Daedric and has a Daedric sword as well. I know its not the best, but I just thought there's only one Argonian follower in the game and that's Derkeethus, and he kinda sucks. So enjoy! He's strong, and always will help you!



[/size]
author: OverloadedGrenade
